author: Ava Peacock
title: 12pm Office Hours Today
question: I tried joining the office hours scheduled for 12pm today but it doesn't seem like anyone is there. Are they cancelled today?
student_answer: no, I am in the office hour rn... are you sure you are clicking the right link?
instructor_answer: They are online today! Check updates on @9 (and check there for the zoom link)
